title: Yasuo disabled :'(
body: Does anyone know why yasuo is disabled or what the bug is? :O

replies.body: I hope Yasuo is disabled for life.
The bug was that when an  enemy champion was knocked up, yasuos tornado could knock them up even higher, or so i was told

> [{quoted}](name=Genisys,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YvhYLf2f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-09T22:55:53.348+0000)
>
> The bug was that when an  enemy champion was knocked up, yasuos tornado could knock them up even higher, or so i was told

The most popular theory is that people could shoot things through his wind wall
I good yasuo doesn't even need his windwall all he needs is his cc

> [{quoted}](name=HeadHunter Yasuo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YvhYLf2f,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-10T02:36:47.722+0000)
>
> I good yasuo doesn't even need his windwall all he needs is his cc

Indeed, unless he is in the jg then things get tough
I just want to know when can they fix it
yes I would also like to know its been a few days already, yasuo calls. I must answer his call. so please set him free :D
My mate literally stopped playing LoL cause of this XD, in respect to his main yasuo he stopped playing LoL till yasuo is fixed.

I found this thread that explained the bugs.

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3g53xr/now_that_yasuo_is_disabled_can_you_finally_look/

Save up aaaalll my ip and finally when I have enough he's disabled

BibleThump
